section.name: Serving binaries with the BinariesServlet
section.p: The HST2 contains a servlet for serving binaries, e.g. a gif image or a pdf document, which are stored in the repository. The servlet should be installed in your web.xml, see configuration.

subsection.name: How does it work?
subsection.p: All data in Hippo Repository is stored as property of a certain node. The BinariesServlet will look for a node in the repository based on the URL it gets.
If above node and properties are found, the servlet will fetch the asset from the repository and:

ul.li: set the found mime type to the response
write the property as stream to the response

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: It is common use to access the BinariesServlet in the src attribute of a img tag, or in the href attribute of the a tag.
